titleStmt.title: Articles exhibited to the Honourable House of Commons assembled in Parliament, against the Lord Inchiquine Lord president of Munster, subscribed by the Lord Broghill and Sir Arthur Loftus Knight. Together with a full and cleare answer their unto made whereby it appeares that the said articles are false scandalous and full of groundlesse aspersions. Subscribed by Rich. Gething Secretary to the said Lord President.
titleStmt.author: Inchiquin, Murrough O'Brien, Earl of, 1614-1674.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Hu. Tuckey, at the Black Spread Eagle in Fleet-Street, over against St. Dunstons Church.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Black Spread Eagle in Fleet-Street, over against St. Dunstons Church.
